title: Britain's Finance Minister is sacked
description: It comes after Kwasi Kwarteng was recalled from Washington for talks with the PM. Liz Truss is under pressure to rethink her economic plans. Also: what do we do with the billions of unwanted mobile phones? and we hear Freddie Mercury's vocals on a re-discovered Queen song.
itunes:subtitle: It comes after Kwasi Kwarteng was recalled from Washington for talks with the PM
itunes:summary: It comes after Kwasi Kwarteng was recalled from Washington for talks with the PM. Liz Truss is under pressure to rethink her economic plans. Also: what do we do with the billions of unwanted mobile phones? and we hear Freddie Mercury's vocals on a re-discovered Queen song.
itunes:author: BBC World Service
